title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
summary: Implement MFA-enabled secure login and user authorization management.
description: Develop a secure authentication mechanism incorporating multi-factor authentication (MFA) for user access to the self-service banking portal. Include role-based access control (RBAC) to ensure users can only view and manage services based on their profiles and authorization levels. Integrate with existing bank identity systems and implement security measures such as encryption, session timeout, and brute-force protection policies.

title: Personalized Dashboard Development
summary: Create a customer-focused dashboard personalized by profile and eligibility.
description: Design and implement a user-friendly, customizable customer dashboard displaying relevant banking products, services, and account summaries according to eligibility and profile segmentation. Include modules for recent activity, quick access actions, and personalized promotions, ensuring data presented is accurate and relevant in real-time.

title: Responsive Design and Cross-Device Support
summary: Ensure responsive UI for consistent performance across all devices.
description: Develop the self-service portal’s frontend with responsive design best practices to maintain consistent usability and layout across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices. Implement adaptive page rendering and accessibility compliance to support customers with diverse needs and devices.

title: Account Opening and Service Management Workflows
summary: Enable digital account opening and service change requests through efficient workflows.
description: Build guided workflows enabling customers to open new accounts and modify existing banking relationships via the portal. Incorporate automated data prefill from existing customer information, minimal user inputs, and real-time validation of fields. Allow saving incomplete applications and resumption at any stage, ensuring an intuitive and streamlined end-to-end user experience.

title: Document Upload and Management
summary: Allow secure document upload and management directly from the user portal.
description: Provide functionality within the portal for customers to securely upload, review, and manage required documentation for account openings and service changes. Ensure secure file transmission, encrypted storage, and compliance with applicable regulatory standards for financial data. Include automated document validation and user notifications upon successful upload.

title: Real-Time Notifications and Status Tracking
summary: Develop a robust notification and tracking system for service requests.
description: Implement real-time tracking and notifications for customer-initiated requests. Provide visual progress indicators, notifications via email and in-app alerts, and automatic updates on request statuses (e.g., pending review, approved, or completed). Integrate with workflow processes to ensure customers remain informed throughout all stages of their requests.

title: Customer Interaction History and Activity Logs
summary: Maintain a detailed history of all user activities and submitted requests.
description: Design a comprehensive interaction tracking module that logs all customer activities including service requests, document uploads, and other portal actions. Provide customers secure access to view their complete activity history while maintaining full compliance with audit, data retention, and privacy requirements.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s core systems for data synchronization.
description: Develop and implement secure APIs and middleware to integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s core banking system. Ensure reliable bidirectional data exchange for accounts, transactions, and service updates. Emphasize real-time synchronization, error handling, and performance optimization to prevent discrepancies and ensure system integrity.

title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Establish a high-performance database architecture supporting portal operations.
description: Design and deploy a dedicated database optimized for portal-specific operations such as user sessions, document metadata, request tracking, and interaction logs. Ensure performance, scalability, and redundancy through optimized indexing, caching, load balancing, and automated backup mechanisms. Apply encryption and database-level security measures to protect sensitive banking information.

title: Security, Compliance, and Data Protection Framework
summary: Implement comprehensive security and compliance protocols across the solution.
description: Apply rigorous security practices including encryption at rest and in transit, regular vulnerability scans, and penetration testing. Ensure compliance with standards and regulations such as GDPR, PCI DSS, and local banking security guidelines. Introduce automated compliance checks, incident monitoring, and audit-ready reporting to maintain trust and operational integrity.
